channel.title: Naming emotes
channel.description:
sorry i sound really nooby but i need to rename the emote buttons, for example. bank, train etc
i had them names on my other server but it got ruined and i cant find where to add them now, please can you just tell me the code to search for :)
its for part of my tailor skill so its worth it if you do help me ;D

@happy2help wrote:

thank you very much
